categories.name: Docker
categories.description: To use the Docker features, use the commands below:

containers-allowed.partOne: In order to be able to use the gear-docker features, the names of the containers must be configured.
containers-allowed.partTwo: Enter the list of containers that you want to enable, separated by a comma. *The old list will be lost*.
containers-allowed.partThree: To enable use in any container say it: *all-containers*. (Caution: By doing this, anyone can start, stop, and restart all the host containers.)
containers-allowed.partFour: If you want to keep the current configuration say it: *keep*

container.notFound: Sorry, this container does not exist.
container.withoutPermission: It is not allowed to manipulate this container.
